The act of creating a [demilich](/Monsters.aspx?ID=283) sometimes goes horribly awry, leaving behind a shattered remnant of a once-mighty spellcaster constantly leaking eldritch energies. The ruined spirit animates a cloud of debased copies of itself, glittering with cracked crystals in crude imitation, and it hungers constantly for the magical energies denied it in its corrupted immortality. Some of the spellcaster's personality remains in the swarm, albeit usually unnaturally split between the skulls. As a consequence, the skulls argue among themselves as warring parts of the personality clamor to be heard, resulting in the swarm's fractious, inconstant attitude. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Sorcerous Skull Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1309) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 245 **Perception** +24; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +28, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +28 **Str** -3 **Dex** +6 **Con** +4 **Int** +8 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +22 **Ref** +26 **Will** +26 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 190 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** bludgeoning 6, cold 12, electricity 12, fire 12, piercing 12, slashing 12 **Weaknesses** area damage 12, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 12 **Boneshard Burst** When a sorcerous skull swarm is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it erupts in an explosion of foul energy and bone fragments in a 30-foot burst, dealing 3d12 piercing damage and 3d12 negative damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save)
**Consume Spell** **Trigger** The swarm is targeted with a spell; **Effect** The swarm casts [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell. If it successfully counteracts the spell, it gains temporary Hit Points equal to twice the level of the counteracted spell that last for 1 minute. --- **Speed** fly 40 feet **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 36, attack +26 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **7th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will), [Spell Turning](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) - **Constant (7th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Siphon Magic** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The sorcerous skull swarm saps magic from nearby creatures. Any creature with the ability to cast spells (including innate spells) in the swarm's space takes 15d6 mental damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save); on a failure, the creature is also [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (stupefied 3 on a critical failure). **Swarming Gnaw** Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 5d8 piercing damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
